project1.title: 3D Villafranca
project1.description: Web application for ordering 3D printed models. Created from scratch using Next.js, Styled Components and SWR

project2.title: Vanacond trainer
project2.description: Web application for promoting personal training and nutrition. Created from scratch using Next.js, Styled Components and i18next

project3.title: Mercaprice
project3.description: Web application for tracking prices of Mercadona products. Uses Node scripts to keep prices and products updated
